full_description: 依次执行: put_bottles_dustbin_stack_blocks_three, open_microwave. 依次执行: put_bottles_dustbin, stack_blocks_three. use arms to grab the bottles and put them into the dustbin to the left of the table Then there are three blocks on the table, the color of the blocks is <red, green and blue>, <move the blocks to the center of the table>, and <stack the blue block on the green block, and the green block on the red block> Then Use one arm to open the microwave.
schema: Task1: Task1: {A} notifies the first bottle, {B} notifies the second bottle, {C} notifies the third bottle, {D} notifies the dustbin; Task2: {A} notifies the red block, {B} notifies the green block, {C} notifies the blue block, {a} notifies the arm to manipulate the red block, {b} notifies the arm to manipulate the green block, {c} notifies the arm to manipulate the blue block; Task2: {A} notifies the microwave, {a} notifies the arm to open the microwave
preference: num of words should not exceed 25
seen: Complete the combined task: 依次执行: put_bottles_dustbin_stack_blocks_three, open_microwave
Step 1: Complete the combined task: 依次执行: put_bottles_dustbin, stack_blocks_three
Step 2: Use {a} to pull open the door of {A}.
